amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 118-12 to ensure all funds made available under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act 1965 after the date of the enactment shall be consolidated and awarded to each State.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to ensure all funds made available under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act 1965 after the date of the enactment shall be consolidated and awarded to each State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 331 (Roll no. 159).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Roy.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 331 (Roll no. 159).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
